title: Ministries
meta_content: There are a handful of age groups and activities at Faith Alive Fellowship, come check them out!
content:
Toddler's Care

During Sunday morning worship and Thursday night prayer toddlers care is provided for up to 4 years of age. We have a dedicated room for the kiddos complimented with a closet full of toys,

Children's Church

Come on in and join the all-original comic book curriculum featuring the Warriors of the Word! Childcare is provided for all regular services for ages 4 through 10.

Youth Group

Youth group currently occurs as opportunities and interest arise. Ages 11 and up join the adults in the congregation during normal services.
